alert.application: This section contains the name of the application. It is possible to internationalize it by putting the name in English.
alert.references: References are a set of information used to specify the context of the measurement or observation. To describe a reference, we list the names of the desired columns and specify the list of columns that form the natural key.

home.title: What do you want to do?
home.content: Welcome to the application configuration file creation and editing tool. You can either continue or modify an existing file by pressing the “Upload” button, or create a new file by pressing the “New” button.

errors.length: The application name must be less than 26 characters

references.title: References
references.subtitle: You can add the application references from this page. Either from a CSV file to import, or by manually adding each reference.
